title: Rice pancakes with creamy crab
ingredients: ['75 g (2½ oz) long-grain white rice', '170 g (6 oz) plain flour', 'pinch of salt', '1 tsp bicarbonate of soda', '1 tsp cream of tartar', '2 eggs', '150 ml (5 fl oz) semi-skimmed milk', '1½ tbsp sunflower oil', 'Crab topping', '3 tbsp soured cream', '170 g (6 oz) fresh white crab meat', '2 tbsp chopped fresh dill', 'pepper', 'To serve', '1 jar red lumpfish roe, about 55 g', 'sprigs of fresh dill', 'lime wedges']
